titles.title: A bill to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to designate perchlorate as a contaminant and to establish a maximum contaminant level for perchlorate.
A bill to amend the Safe Drinking Water Act to designate perchlorate as a contaminant and to establish a maximum contaminant level for perchlorate.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: Amends the Safe Drinking Water Act to require the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency to designate perchlorate as a contaminant and to establish a maximum contaminant level that provides an adequate margin of safety for vulnerable populations.
